task.name: defintent
task.description: Allows the user to manually set scan intents

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of input visibility file (MS) Default: none
Example: vis='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: intent
param.shortdescription: list of intent strings to add to intents
param.description: select intent to add The list of strings will be combined into an intent string to be added

param.name: outputvis
param.shortdescription: Makes a copy of the ms to edit
param.description: Creates an output ms with all the changes from the task leaving the original vis untouched.

param.name: scan
param.description: Select Scan to apply the new intents to

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: Select field using field id(s) or field name(s)
param.description: Select field using field id(s) or field name(s)
